name: War of the Gods
effects: Increase all stats by 100% for 2 turns to all allies while singing
Reduce ATK, DEF, MAG and SPR by 40% for 2 turns to all enemies
Restore 800 (+5.5x, Heal) HP split over 2 turns to all allies while singing
Restore 20 (+0.2x, Heal) MP split over 2 turns to all allies while singing

Gain access to following skills (1 use):
Victory to the Brave (502910)

name: War of the Gods
三章·神魔激戰
제 3장~신마격전~
Guerre des dieux
Krieg der Götter
Guerra entre dioses
desc_short: Reduce ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR for all enemies and boost ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR and gradually restore HP and MP for all allies, and enable victory to the brave for one turn
歌唱期間降低全體敵人攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值+提高全體隊員攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值+持續恢復HP、MP+可以使用1次「最終章·勇者凱歌」
노래하는 동안 적 전체에 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 감소+아군 전체의 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 상승+HP와 MP서서히 회복+'최종장~용사의 개가~' 1회 사용 가능
Réduit ATT/DEF/MAGIE/PSY de tous les ennemis, augmente ATT/DEF/MAGIE/PSY et restaure progressivement les PV/PM de tous les alliés. Active Victoire des braves pendant un tour
ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch, alle Verb. während das Lied andauert und stellt allmählich alle LP und MP wieder her. Erlaubt Trumpf der Mutigen in der nächsten Runde.
Reduce ATQ, DEF, MAG y ESP de todos los enemigos, aumenta ATQ, DEF, MAG y ESP y recupera VIT y PM de todos los aliados y aprende Victoria del valeroso un turno
desc_long: Reduces ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR for all enemies and boosts ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR and gradually restores HP and MP for all allies, and enables victory to the brave for one turn.
歌唱期間降低全體敵人攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值，同時提高全體隊員攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值，並持續恢復HP、MP，可以使用1次「最終章·勇者凱歌」。
노래하는 동안 적 전체의 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력이 감소하고, 아군 전체의 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력이 상승하며, HP와 MP가 서서히 회복하고, '최종장~용사의 개가~'를 1회 사용할 수 있게 됩니다.
Réduit ATT/DEF/MAGIE/PSY de tous les ennemis, augmente ATT/DEF/MAGIE/PSY et restaure progressivement les PV/PM de tous les alliés. Active Victoire des braves pendant un tour
ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY hoch, alle Verb. während das Lied andauert und stellt allmählich alle LP und MP wieder her. Erlaubt Trumpf der Mutigen in der nächsten Runde.
Reduce el ATQ, la DEF, la MAG y el ESP de todos los enemigos, aumenta el ATQ, la DEF, la MAG y el ESP y recupera VIT y PM de todos los aliados y aprende Victoria del valeroso durante un turno.
